1.content:
It was Troy Brady's first day of college, he had just moved in all his stuff and was waiting around for his roomie to arrive. Bored, Troy looked at himself in the full length mirror he had installed on his closet door. He looked about the same as he did leaving high school, tall, about 6 foot with a swimmers build, carrying about 150 pounds on his muscled frame. He had added a few pounds over the summer, no longer exercising as he use too. He didn't really notice but his lower abs were starting to disappear under a thin layer of fat.

A boy of much the same stature as Troy walked into the room and introduced himself as Cliff, Troy's roommate.

The two exchanged introductions and small talk. Cliff was from up north, and was a track runner in high school. As Cliff finished talking, his stomach squirmed.

"Heh, sorry, it has been doing that a lot lately, want to run down to the Cafeteria to get some grub."

"Sure man," Troy replied, patting his nearly flat abdomen "I could use some food, too"

Arriving at the cafeteria, the two were amazed at how large and well stocked of different foods there were.

"And it is buffet style" Cliff added, "This is not going to be good for my already rising waist."

Cliff raised his shirt and revealed a small roll of fat, barely enough to pinch.

"Dude, quite worrying, you are still thin, and besides we get a free membership to the campus gym, lets just enjoy ourselves."

And the two did enjoy, each went back numerous times to try different foods and find there favorites. On top of the many full trays of food, each filled a plate with delicious desserts
1.title: Beginning

11.content:
"Try these as well"
"Okay"

Troy gave a nod and gladly accepted Cliff's delicious offer; French pastries. The two sat down on their beds and were trying the sweets Cliff has been given from his mother before he left home. Troy did really like them, and was trying one after another.

"It's delicious!"
"Strawberry and whipped cream, my favorite!" Cliff exclaimed in glee as he grabbed a piece for himself from the sweets' box. He dug in and insisted Troy gets some of his as well. The boy did and he was glad in doing so "Tasty!"
"I'm addicted to this stuff, it's hilarious" Cliff then let a chuckle. he patted his belly "I think that's why I'm turning more into a pig!"

Troy laughed a little at that. He said after finishing his pastry "You're making a huge fuss, it's not like a small cake could make you very fat"

"Oh please, ask me- it's as if everything I eat goes straight to my waist!" Cliff spoke up, his index finger poking the small fat on his waist and clearly hating it "No matter what you do or what you eat, it's always there"
"Well, you still look fine"
"You look better though"

Troy looked down at his own stomach. it was bunching slightly underneath his t-shirt and Troy could feel that. It was a very uncomfortable feeling and Troy wondered since when his stomach felt like this. He spoke up nervously 'Y-yeah..."

"Ladies like strong and muscular boys, when they see you like this, they don't give you a chance" Cliff grabbed the small layer of fat on his abdomen "It's okay if a girl has a small belly or something, because they have other stuff to show off with. We, if not muscular, have none. We need to stay in shape always"
"Maybe..." Troy gave a light shrug of his shoulders "But, some girls like chubby guys"
"Yeah, grandma"

The two shared a nice laugh. Troy was startled to see that Cliff, and after all his complaining, reached for another piece of pastry "Dude?"

"Hum?" Cliff's eyes didn't leave his food. he was enjoying every bite of his chocolate-dark chocolate pastry "Humm?"
"Nothing, nothing"

Cliff gulped quickly and extended his full spoon "Want some?"

"No thanks"
"Okay then. I'm eating all of them- don't care"

Troy flashed Cliff a rather nervous smile and got up from his bed, leaving Cliff eating his pastries alone. Troy made his way to his closet and examined himself in his full length mirror secretly and without Cliff noticing him. His hand lifted up his t-shirt and his other one rubbed his abdomen slowly. He was too taken by the fact that he couldn't feel his abs like he used to that he didn't notice Cliff walking his direction.

Before Troy could react or turn around, Cliff slapped hard his roomie's ass and let a hard crazy ass laugh as he ran away out of their room.

"HEY!"

Troy, and in that moment, forgot competently about his stomach and went to chase after Cliff, seeking revenge.
11.title: Later that night

111.content:
Troy and Cliff weren't the most brilliants students in college, though, they made it in most of their lectures, they studied a bit, had fun more, and certainly enjoyed their late night parties with pizza and beer. It has been a month now, and the two were already used to this lifestyle.

Troy made efforts in his studies more than Cliff did. This latter wasn't bad himself, but he just couldn't get up in the morning and go listen to a boring lecture everyday. When Troy bugged him until he got up, he would, but when Troy was late himself and had to go fast, he wouldn't have time to wait until Cliff wakes up from that bed of his, so he'd just leave him sleeping.

Today, Troy was up early, and he wasn't going to let Cliff sleep in peace.

"Dude, get up"
"Huum"

Troy narrowed his eyes at his roommate, who shoved his blanket away and let Troy get a full glimpse of his naked torso; Cliff hasn't been doing a great job in staying in shape, and his belly which now spilled over his boxers was a great proof. He was annoyed at that, and he always complained that he couldn't get a girl because of it, yet he never stopped eating more and more- heck, Troy could swear Cliff ate even more and more when he complained. Weird.

"Get up fatty"
"Hummmmmm...." Cliff turned to sleep on his right. He mumbled "You're the fatty"
"Cliff, get up"

Troy tried very hard to not to think about it, after all, Cliff was... true; Troy had also let himself go. He snacked late at night and ate a lot when Cliff did. He knew something was wrong when he couldn't button his pair of jeans anymore, and when he had to borrow Cliff's pants. Troy could feel his belly's softness when he took a shower or walked and felt it jiggle. He even sucked in it when he talked to girl, afraid she'd notice.

Yet, he didn't want to admit it. He was so embarrassed of himself that he hated to admit it. He even felt ashamed when he looked himself in the mirror and saw how his fat sides spilled over his pants. Just embarrassing.

"Hummm-"
"Fine! I'm going! Clean the room!"

Troy stormed out of the room angrily, after shoving some empty boxes of pizza out of his way. His yelling made Cliff sit down and wonder what the hell has just happened.
111.title: One month later

1111.content:
Thanksgiving was approaching, and Troy and Cliff were getting ready to leave for their home. It has been two months now that the two started their freshman year. A lot of bad and good stuff happened. To Cliff, everything was fine and good, to Troy, everything was going down and very badly.

"Mom makes the best Turkey of all times, I miss her cooking" Cliff spoke up as he shoved his clothes to his suitcase, not bothering himself to fold them or put them in order "Being home is good- with the food and all, it's good!"

Getting no answer, Cliff looked up at Troy. The guy was laying down on his bed, t-shirt ridden halfway up his belly as it spilled over his unbuttoned jeans. It rippled and showed more rolls of fat as Troy pushed himself into a sitting position and kept poking at it. With him looking down, he was sporting his new baby double chin, something Cliff has managed to avoid because he seemed to gain only around the waist, the belly and the thighs. A jiggly ass is better than a fat chin anyway!

Cliff was used to Troy nagging about his gut most of the times, but he just extended the limits. Why making a fuss about a little belly? Everyone gets the Freshman 15 anyway. No one is safe.

"Hey dude, ya okay?"
"Uhm"

Cliff waked over his friend's bed. He reached for Troy's little tummy and patted it, mocking him "A boy or a girl?"

"Cliff!" Troy slapped his hand away. He narrowed his eyes at him "You're not better off!"
"Well, I'm not being a drama queen, at least"
"I'm not being a drama queen!" Troy leaped out of his bed, feeling his belly jiggle a bit and hating it "I'm trying to be reasonable here!"
"Reasonable? You're not going to lose weight if you poke at that gut of yours everyday"

Troy knew Cliff was right. "Just... get up and collect your stuff. Go home and forget about this"

"Another 15 pounds at home and I officially am not fitting in any of my shirts anymore"
"Dude, chill out"
"They're going to make fun of me when they see me like this..." Troy patted his fattened torso. He turned around and felt awful when he saw how his love handles stuck out further than they did... last month "Shit. Looks to me more like the Freshman 20! I can barely believe that I was muscular months ago!"

"You need my pants again?!" Cliff elbowed his roomie, flashing him a teasing look. Troy let a defeated sigh, looking down again at his stomach and making Cliff smirk secretly at the sight of his double chin forming,

"Maybe"
"Chill out. The turkey is awaiting"
"And the pounds are waiting too"
1111.title: Thanksgiving

choices: Before he could answer, all his siblings come
11111.content:
After saying their goodbyes Troy and cliff went in different directions.

After a hour of traveling, Troy got down the taxi and took his steps towards his house.
"Here I go..." He gulped. The doorbell rang and opened to reveal a woman standing and smiling.

"Troy! You're home!" Troy's mom said while she went to go hug him. When she reached Troy and hugged him, Troy's mom felt something touching her thin body.

"Troy! What happened to this!" She said while poking his gut and laughing.

"Umm...it's freshman 15..." Said the embarassed boy.

"More like freshman 30", said a voice from behind"

"Hi dad...." Said Troy. "Hi son, I see you're continuing the family tradition" said Troy's dad while squeezing Troy's gut.
Troy's dad was himself very large. Infact every man above 17.

"Dad!"

"Haha just kidding son, I'm actually happy you gained weight, you were too skinny" said Troy's dad.

"I agree" said Troy's mom.

"Where are everyone?" Troy asked.

"Your 2 sisters went to school (Ann and Belle are twins and are in 2nd grade), Mike has also gone to school (Mike is 12 year old who is in 7th grade) and Alex has gone to hangout with his friends (Alex is a restaurant owner and is 28 years old)"

"Oh..", Troy said, releived but knew even his siblings will come to know about his gain...

"So now that you're home, what will you do?" Asked his mom while his dad was watching TV

"I am...."
11111.title: Home at last

choices: Mike comes in the house (Troy's 12 year old brother)
Alex comes in the house (Troy's 28 year old brother)
111111.content:
"I am hungry. Can I eat something?", Said Troy.

"Careful, don't make it freshman 60" said Troy's dad from the living room laughing.

"Oh enough dear, you're teasing him from the time he got home." Said Troy's mom.

Troy went to his old room, took a bath and wore the same pants which cliff gave him because his other pants were not fitting. He wore a plain red T-shirt which was a bit tight and showed some of his belly but wasn't that noticeable.

He then went to the dinning room and his mother brought him 2 burgers, a big bowl of noodles and some icecream for dessert. Troy ate it without any hesitation. By the end of one burger and some noodles, the pants which cliff gave were feeling a bit tight, but Troy was to busy eating. After the whole meal Troy went and slept for a bit.

He woke up to the sound of a doorbell. It was his 2 twin sisters, Ann and Belle.

"Ann, Belle. What are you two doing here so early?" Asked Their mom.

"We had a half-day!" Said both of them happily

"Oh good, because there is someone special here to meet you!" Said their excitedly because they were still small children and needed that type of talk.

"Is it santa?" Asked Belle.

"No honey" said their mom laughing " it's your brother, Troy!"

Both the twins shouted with excitement. They loved Troy, infact all the siblings loved eachother.
Just then Troy had come out of his room and ran towards them and hugged them tightly forgetting his belly

"Brother Troy, did you eat an elephant like brother Alex" asked Ann.
The twins didn't use logic and used creativity and that is why Troy wasn't embarrassed infront of them. And also Alex was also chubby, infact fat and wasn't embarrassed.

"Yeah Ann, I did" said Troy

"Cool!" Replied the twins

"Do you guys wanna play with the elephant?" Asked troy

"Yes!" Said the twin while rubbing and jiggling Troy's belly
Troy's dad and mom smiled, not for the fact they were playing with Troy's belly but seeing that they got along so well.

"Ok girls, go and fresh up...then you can play with the elephant" said their mom laughing.
And they did.

Suddenly...
111111.title: Unintentional gain

choices: The thought of fattening up Mike
1111111.content:
"Ok girls, go and fresh up...then you can play with the elephant" said their mom laughing.
And they did.

Suddenly, Mike comes in the house.
Mike sees Troy, right there Infront of him with his belly showing.
Troy's face lit up with embarassment

"Hi Mike...." Said Troy

"Hi...Troy" said Mike with audible giggles

"I was as surprised as you are, Mike" said Troy's dad from the living room

"Dad!" Said Troy embarassed

"Ok Troy, take care of Mike. Me and your dad are gonna take Belle and Ann for shopping. We are gonna be late. So eat your dinner and sleep" said Troy's mom

"Ok" replied Troy

After a few minutes, their parents went with taking the twins with them.
Mike talked to Troy like he hadn't noticed Troy's belly. But then...

"So Troy, how'd you get this" Mike said slapping Troy's belly, which made a thump sound.

"Hey! It hurts" said Troy.

"Sorry, but seriously how did you get this" said make again, poking Troy's belly gently.

"It's just freshman 15"

"Oh really" said Mike laughing " that looks more than just a freshman 15".

"Oh come on, maybe it's genetic. I mean following from our great grandfather to...me, everyone is gaining weight." Said Troy and it was actually true. It was genetic, and definitely Troy's gained appetite

"Oh...do you think...I'll be fat too..." Said Mike.

"Maybe and hey, you'd actually look good with a bit of meat on you, unlike me." Said Troy.

"Are you kidding? You look better chubby then thin. You were too scrawny" said Mike patting Troy's belly.

"Ok thanks bro. To be honest, I was scared that you guys will make fun of me" said Troy.

"Oh, don't worry. We all always be together, even though we make fun of sometimes" said Mike hugging Troy.

While talking to Mike, Troy hadn't noticed that it was raining and just then his phone rang and it was his parents. They said it was raining and couldn't come and Alex was coming home in an hour or so.
Mike was both happy and scared. Happy to see his brother after a long time and scared because of his new chubby gut.
He told Mike everything what their parents had told him.
Then they went on to watching TV.

"Hey are you hungry" Mike said " 'cause I am".

"I can make you some sandwiches"

"What about you" asked Mike.

Troy hit his belly which jiggled a bit and said "I don't want this to grow any bigger" but began to rephrase his sentence " I am hungry though... Fine I'll eat some too" and moved towards the kitchen and asked "hey Mike, how many sandwiches do you want?"

"Um.. 2 are enough" replied Mike.

Troy came back back with a tray 7 sandwiches; 2 for Mike , 5 for Troy

"Woah big boy, you are sure eating alot" said Mike.

Troy didn't say anything and started eating.
Troy took out his shirt which was straining against his belly.
Mike saw the belly which was revealed and poked it.

"Oh sorry, I was just seeing". Said Mike

"It's ok bro, touch it if you want. I don't mind" . Said Troy.

Mike squished, jiggled and poked Troy's belly. He had agree that seeing his brother becoming chubby and playing with his belly was fun.

After eating Troy wore a t-shirt from his closet which tighter and showed more of his belly. But it was ok.
Mike was sleepy and slept on his brother's soft belly. Even Troy had decided to sleep, but before he could, he was interrupted by...
1111111.title: Mike comes in the house (Troy's 12 year old...

choices: 2 large plates of spaghetti and 2 big glasses filled with milkshake
A 6-inch cake and chocolate icecream with 2 glasses of milkshake
11111112.content:
After eating Troy wore a t-shirt from his closet which was tighter and showed more of his belly. But it was ok.
Mike was sleepy and decided to sleep on his brother's soft belly. Even Troy had decided to sleep, but before he could, he was interrupted by the sound of a doorbell.

Mike was still asleep, but Troy got up and opened the door.
It was his older brother, Alex.

"Oh my god, dude! It so good to see you" said Alex.

"Hi Alex!" said Troy agreeing

"Why are you just standing there? Come here!" Said Alex in excitement.
They both went in for a hug. But when they did, both Alex and Troy felt something.

"Dude, what happened to you" said Alex laughing and slapping Troy's belly.

"It's just freshman 15....and increase in my appetite.." admitted Troy.

"Wow! You look much better, and cute" said Alex nudging Troy "got any girlfriends?"

"Not with this fat elephant here" said Troy squishing his belly.

"Bro, are you kidding" said Alex, " my fat belly is the reason I have a girlfriend right now"

Troy looked down at Alex's belly and he was HUGE, not obese but a great amount of overweight.

"But most girls don't look at me at all" said Troy

"Just take off your shirt in campus and girls will be attracted like magnets" said Alex patting his belly.

After a few minutes, Alex carried Mike into his room had he was sleeping and Troy and Alex started to talk, Troy also told that their parents won't be here for until the next night.
But just then there was a phone call from their parents. They said that there was a storm and all the road are blocked and they will stay at their aunt's house.

"Aww man, their not gonna be home for Thanksgiving!" Complained Troy.

"No worries bro, we can have have 2 Thanksgivings! One on Thanksgiving and second when mom and dad come home!" Said Alex.

"Yeah...that's a great idea Alex! I'll call mom and dad later and tell them about this plan!"

"Hey are you hungry? I'm SUPER hungry" said Alex.

"I've had like 5 sandwiches like an hour ago...but I could eat some more" said Troy with an awkward smile. " But what are you going to make?"

"Troy, I'm a restaurant owner, I can whip up some delicious food" said Alex.
In about 25 minutes, Alex comes out of the kitchen with....
11111112.title: The Fat Brother!

111111122.content:
Alex goes in the kitchen to make some food.
In about 25 minutes, Alex comes out of the kitchen with a 6-inch cake and chocolate icecream with 2 glasses of milkshake.

"Woah woah, isn't that a little bit too much?" Says Troy.

"Its ok, we can each have 5 slices of the cake each" says Alex.

"But...I can't eat that much" said Troy.

"Fine. If you finish your meal before me then I'll do anything you say. And if I lose, then you can make me do anything" said Alex.
Troy couldn't let go of this offer and accepted.

"1...2...3... GO!" Said Alex.

Troy started of slow, by the time he finished his first cake, Alex was eating his third.
When Troy ate his second cake, his pants started to get tight.

Alex now finished his fifth slice and started to eat his icecream.
Both Alex and Troy had 4 scoops of icecream each.

Now Troy, really wanting to win shoved the cake and 2 scoops of icecream in his mouth.
Now both the brothers were together. But that didn't last longer as Troy took a burp break.

"Nice burp bro!" Commented Alex.

When Troy finished his icecream, Alex was already halfway through the milkshake.
Alex didn't stop at all. He basically inhaled the milkshake within one breath and burped loudly.

"*Burp* ahhhh! I win!" Said Alex.

"Ugh..." Complained Troy, " just say what I have to do".

"Oh oh, wait now, I haven't decided yet. I'll let you know when I get some" said Alex, grinning.

After cleaning up. They decided to sleep as it was late and were very sleepy.

It was morning. Alex woke Troy up and says....
111111122.title: A Big Dinner!

1111111222.content:
It was morning. Alex woke up Troy and says "let's go buy you some clothes".

"What?" Said Troy still a little sleepy.

"You heard me" said Alex "let's go".

"Why?" said Troy.

"You kidding? Look at you. You look like whale" said Alex pointing at Troy's belly.

"Hey! You're fatter than me!" Complained Troy.

"Yeah, but with fitting clothes" said Alex.

"Fine......." Said Troy.

Troy got up and was brushing his teeth, when suddenly Alex comes in.
"Hey fatty, what's up"

"Nothing, just brushing." Said Troy.

"Hey look, there's a weighing machine. Let's weigh eachother" said Alex pointing at the weighing machine.

"Ok" said Troy.

"How much did you weigh before. I was 170".

I was 133" said Troy.

"You're probably 200+ now" said Alex laughing.

"Well i guess you're 300+ now" said Troy.

Alex got up on the machine and machine showed the numbers "213"

"You gained 43 pounds!"

"Hey it was a long time ago when I was 170 and it was a long time ago when I weighed myself"

"Ok. Now I'll go" said Troy
Troy stood up on the machine

It said.....
1111111222.title: "let's go buy you some clothes"

choices: He decides to go to the gym
He decides to shop for some bigger clothes
He takes a walk around campus
12.content:
A week later, Troy was left alone in the dorm, laying on his bed feeling sorry for himself. His clothes lay scattered around him. His soft white stomach had plumped out over the top of his waistline, and now, no matter how hard he pulled or sucked it in, he couldn't managed to get his pants buttoned. After a few days of overeating, Cliff had noticed his swelling waistline and hit gym. Why didn't I do the same thing?!, Troy wondered to himself.

He sat up. As he did, the fat around his middle pooled itself into three soft rolls, replacing his once muscled six-pack. With another twinge of guilt, Troy grabs one of his larger shirts and pulls it over his head, without bothering to try and button his pants again. He stands, looking at himself in the mirror. Finally something goes right! With his shirt hanging over his waistline, this newly flabby stomach was safely hidden and you couldn't even see that his pants weren't buttoned.

Troy turns and looks at himself sideways, and the good feeling fades. It's obvious that his pants are starting to strain from the added effort of his growing thighs and bottom. He sighs. If he kept this up, he was going to lose the girls' interest real fast.
12.title: Skip a week

122.content:
Troy sighs. This is not working out. If he doesn't turn his college life around, he will be missing all the parties and the ladies. It's time to see what kind of programs they have at the gym.
Checking out the facilities, Troy finds that they have a good weight room, an indoor track and swimming pool that is available to students. Troy decides to spend his gym time at tge
122.title: He decides to go to the gym

choices: Go swim. It'll never get better if you don't do anything about it.
Go back home. There must be a less humiliating way to lose weight.
Weigh yourself. Maybe its not all that bad.
1221.content:
Weight lifting would just make him bigger, even if he got more muscles that wouldn't get rid of the fat.
And the indoor track was crap, they hadn't fixed that thing up in years and you were likely to trip over the uneven surface.

It seemed the pool was his only option.

In the locker room, he waited for a quite moment, then pulled out his swim trunks and prepared to change. Just as he got them up around his knees, Cliff walked in.

"Hey, dude. Finally doing something about that gut?"

Troy nearly fell over.

"Uh...yeah. I was kinda busy this past week, but I'm ready to start now."
"Great! Never too late to get in shape." Cliff smiled, pulling off his shirt. In just a few days, he had already completely eradicated his trace amounts of summer weight gain. Now his abs looked solid enough to grate cheese on.

Slightly jealous, Troy pulled his shorts the rest of the way up and buttoned- except...they wouldn't button. Looking down, he realized that no matter how hard he pushed, he could not make hole and fastener meet. He was too fat for this swimsuit.

"Yikes, too small?" Cliff quipped, pulling on a pair of trunks that just emphasized his perfect physique. "Looks like you got here not a moment too soon." He pulled a bundle of cloth from his locker and tossed them at Troy. "Here, these are my shorts from the summer, way too big for me now. Maybe you can fit into them."

Troy caught the suit, and Cliff strode confidently out of the locker room. Begrudgingly, Troy slipped them on, only to find that the button was once again, quite distant from the hole. At least now, however, he could force them together, squeezing his fat up and over like toothpaste from a tube.

"Great." He thought to himself, suddenly wondering if coming to the gym was such a good idea after all.

Should Troy...
1221.title: Pool

choices: After a month of jogging around campus.
12212.content:
Troy changed out of Cliff's shorts, packed his stuff, and headed back to the dorm. He collapsed on the bed, wishing that the last hour hadn't happened.

"Why did I try to go swimming? That was probably the stupidest idea I've had in a long time." Troy groaned, putting a hand on your soft, bulging stomach.

"Maybe it's not that bad, being fat. Plenty of guys get fat in college; freshman 15 and stuff. I could just lose weight over the summer." Troy eyed the mini-fridge in the corner, stuffed with fattening treats.

Was he really willing to let himself go further?

Later that year...
12212.title: Go back home. There must be a less humiliating ...

122121.content:
One month later, Troy had still not done anything about his weight. He had gained fifteen pounds and he had to buy more new clothes. He couldn't hide his weight gain if he tried, because even if he sucked his belly in it was prominent.

Cliff had teased him about his growing gut at first, but he started to get used to it. In fact, he had started to buy a lot of extra food for the mini fridge in order to satisfy Troy's now huge appetite. However, Troy wasn't entirely sure he liked his weight gain. He was torn between whether to restrict what he ate but be in better shape, or eat whatever he liked (and he loved eating) and stay fat. In the end, he decided to...
122121.title: After a month of snacking...

1221212.content: It was that month Troy decided, while sitting on the couch, eating a candy bar, that he liked this way of life. He liked eating until it hurt, and lazing around. Sure, he'd get bigger, and sure, he might not draw the attention of every girl around anymore. But if this was just as much fun as partying, why not roll with it. He dialed up a pizza parlor, to officiate his new lifestyle.
1221212.title: Keep his belly

12212121.content:
Troy collapsed on the bed. He'd finished packing his clothes and he was exhuasted. It had been a great Freshman year. Not exactly great grades-wize. Troy was pulling C's. He had intended to play sports but life had gotten in the way. College had been a challenge and studying took more time than Troy expected. After a disasterour first semester when he almost flunked out, Troy had knuckled down and pulled his grads up to passing. The only thing making all that work worthwhile was a good supply of snacks. Troy usually went through a couple of bags of chips and a two litre bottle of soda a night and to reward himslef for the work, treated himself to a pizza and ice cream before bed. Troy had more than tripled the Freshman 15. He was happy with the new weight. Well, maybe not happy but it was better than flunking out in disgrace.
He pulled on his jeans to leave for home and Summer cavation. The 32's he'd brought last fall were long gone. These were 38's and filled to overflowing. Not to worry, Troy told himself. This Summer he would get back in control. He'd be more physically active and drop some of the flab. His Mom would probably be all over him to lose weight too. He'd packed 36's that he was sure he'd be wearing soon.
Grabbing the suitcase, Troy headed for his car and the trip home.
12212121.title: Several months later...

choices: Cliff was starting to get a belly
12212122.content:
A week had passed since Troy decided he would stay fat. He had gained another four pounds! He was sprawled on the sofa, absent-mindedly rubbing his belly, when it started to growl. Troy quickly became ravenous and he hurried to the kitchen, where he pulled out a large tub of chocolate ice cream. He grabbed a spoon and collapsed back on to the sofa. He switched on the TV and quickly began shovelling the ice cream into his mouth.

Fifteen minutes later, Troy had devoured the whole tub! Disappointingly, he wasn't full. After all, he had made stuffing himself his new hobby, so his appetite had increased enormously. He remembered that there was still another tub of ice cream in the freezer. He immediately took it out and he then returned to the sofa to gorge himself.

Half way through the second tub, Troy started to feel very full. However, Troy wasn't going to give up until all of the ice cream was in his belly! He burped loudly. That should make a bit more room, he thought to himself. He shoved the rest into his stomach, ignoring the pain he was in.

Rubbing his swollen gut triumphantly, Troy heard Cliff walk through the door.

"Looking big there, Troy!" laughed Cliff, who walked over to Troy and slapped his gut. Troy looked at Cliff in surprise and noticed...
12212122.title: Several days later...

choices: I want to catch up with you
122121222.content:
"You shouldn't be talking." Troy pushed a finger into a pudgy belly on his friend.
"What can I say." he laughed. "You've made it seem so much fun, I guess
122121222.title: Cliff was starting to get a belly

choices: Check his weight on the scales.
Ask Cliff for a belly rub!
1221212222.content:
"It was only a matter of time!" laughed Troy, "eating is way more fun than working out!"

"I'm starving," said Cliff, wandering over to the kitchen, "is there any ice cream?"

"Sorry, I ate it all!" replied Troy.

"Never mind, we have, like, three pies I can have". said Cliff.

"Nope, I ate them too!"

Cliff sighed and grabbed the phone. He rang up their favourite pizza place and ordered two extra large pizzas. While they were waiting for the pizza to arrive, Troy decided he would...
1221212222.title: It's starting to show

12212122222.content:
"You know what would really feel good right now?" Troy was getting into the idea of the two room mates getting fat.
"What?" Cliff said.

He remembered how good it felt actually stuffing himself beyond full last night, But how would he feel about getting fat? He patted the bulge which was still firm from last night's stuffing and gave it a satisfying thump. Getting dressed, he observed that he really couldn't hide it even under an oversized shirt.

Being a big guy was one thing, being a fat, tub of lard was quite another. His belly bulged proud over his exercise shorts and the shirt was a bit snug but a tug covered up the gap and Troy made his way to the gym. He'd gotten the membership when school started but so far hadn't managed a visit. When he signed in, one of the trainers introduced himself.
"Name's Tim, he announced shoving his hand out.
"Glad to meet you, Tim.I'm Troy."
"Let me show you around while you tell me what you want to accomplish. "
Tim demonstrated the machines, showed him the free weights and chatted in general about how easy it is to gain weight as a college student.
"I got really fat, Freshman year before I woke up. A real hog."

122121222222122.title: Work out at the gym

choices: A week later, and Troy is stronger...
Tim's going to work on making Troy bigger both ways.
1221212222221221.content:
Troy looked at the very fit Tim. There was not an ounce of fat on his body, which was all the better to show off his heavy muscling. Up close, Tim was like a marble statue of human musculature.

"Then I learned how to eat right, and started lifting and cardio. I can bench twice my bodyweight, and I go for bodybuilding competitions."

"Impressive," Troy answered. "Not sure I'm interested in bodybuilding, but I would like some more muscle, keep from blowing up too much. I really like my college lifestyle, but who wants to be a fatass?"

Troy relaxed the gut he had subconsciously been sucking in, and thumped it.

"OK," replied Tim. "Muscle's easy, but you'll blow up anyway if you don't cut the snacking a bit. You should work in some cardio too - doesn't have to be running or anything drastic, just something to help you carry the muscle comfortably."

"Yeah, I see some of the second years look like they got too much into their Freshman 15 and now they're up 50," Troy observed.

"Well, you don't need a total change to stop blowing up, if you catch it early, as you are. Let me set you up with some moves on the weight deck, a few more on the machines, and then you should add some cardio for carrying capacity - swimming, the bike, maybe rowing. You've got good shoulders already, rowing'd probably firm those up nicely."

"Sounds good," replied Troy. "I've canoed a little - I'd like to try the rowing."

"Rowing makes a good balance with chest work and heavy leg work," Tim observed. "It's not my thing - my cardio's all biking - but it'll help you build muscle. And building muscle for my clients is my speciality - and for myself!" He grinned, then flexed one mighty arm. "I assume something like this would interest you?"

"Oh, don't know if I'll get that far," Troy replied.

"Well, the definition takes a lot of work, but the size?"

"Sure, who doesn't want big guns?" Troy replied positively.

'Who wouldn't want you big all over?' Tim thought to himself. But out loud he said, "Right then, you're dressed, so let's get started."
Tim was definitely wanting to help Troy get bigger.

There's kind of a momentum about college life once you start to enjoy it too much and you lose perspective. That's what happened to me. I found that only a total change could stop my blowing up. Let me set up a routine for you on the machines and then you probably will want to add some free weights to that if you really want muscle development. Sound good. You may think that I'm not the guy you need but I know how to build muscle. Just because I went runner don't hold that against me."
Tim was definitely wanting to help Troy get bigger.

12411121211.title: The next day

125.content:
Troy decides that he should clear his head by taking a walk around campus. Besides, he thinks, putting his hand on his belly, I could do with the exercise.

Half way round campus, Troy stops as he smells something delicious. Turning around, he notices a donut shop! One donut wouldn't hurt, thought Troy. He walked up to the counter.

"Hi there!" says the girl serving donuts cheerfully, "I'm Rosalie. How many donuts would you like? We have a special offer today. You can get a dozen for half price!"

"Sounds good!" replies Troy. It's too many for Troy to eat on his own, but he can always give the extras to Cliff. He pays for the donuts and takes a seat at a table near by. He quickly shoves two donuts into his mouth. They are so delicious that he can't stop himself from eating three more. He soon regrets this when he looks down and sees that his shirt is straining due to his growing gut. Troy sighs and stands up, ready to head home. However, he then looks inside the donut box once more and notices that Rosalie has given him her phone number! He turns to look at her and she winks at him, smiling as she looks at his belly. I guess some girls like bigger guys, Troy thinks, suddenly feeling very confident. Then, he...
125.title: He takes a walk around campus

choices: 2 months later going home on X-mas break.
Going shopping you meet a skinny girl (secret Fat Admirter)
Going shopping you meet a skinny girl (a feeder)
Later at the library you run into Cliff and he laughs at you.
13.content:
Man the buffet caeteria food has really taken a toll you think as you rise out of bed. You step on the scale and see you have gained 31 pounds over this month putting you at 181 pounds. You look at the mirror and just can't believe you gained so much. You realize that you have not worked out at all since high school ended earlier this year and you never really liked working out anyway. What is really shocking to you as you get dressed in sweatpants and a t-shirt is the fact that most of your fat had gone to your ass and lower body. Yes you had a belly but man you got a huge ass.

You look in the mirror and you can see your underwear lines thought the very tight sweatpants. You face is softer too and with your longer hair you say, "Yup I definatly take after my mom's side of the family." You take a look at a family picture. Your mom, sister and you in it. You never met your dad he left before you were born. Your mom is there all 400 ounds of her and your sister a year older than you in college @ state 270 pounds of her too. Both your mom and sister are pear shaped, all the weight goes to their hips, thighs and rear ends.

You got a check in the mail from mom, you told her about the need for new cloths but didn't let on how much you gained. You knew you were gonna gain more, whether you wanted to or not, so you felt buying more sweatpants and hoodies will help stretch the money until X-mas break.
13.title: A month down the road

choices: Decide to do something about your weight
131.content:
It has been nearly three months since you started gaining weight, and your constant overeating combined with you not working out has really made you pack on the pounds. You now have a significantly bigger belly as well as a lot more weight on your lower body. You are nervous about seeing your family as you don't know how they will react when they see how fat you are. Then again, both your mother and sister are overweight, so it's not like they're going to judge you.

On the train home, your stomach loudly growls in a desperate attempt for food. You start to fantasise about your favourite foods whilst absent-mindedly rubbing your beer belly.

Walking to your family's house, you notice that a new buffet has opened a few streets away. Since you are so hungry, you decide to get some dinner before you meet up with your family. You walk in and start piling up some plates with huge mounds of food, which you then quickly devour. By the end, you can barely eat another bite. After leaving the buffet, you slowly waddle home.

When you get home, you are given a very warm welcome by your family. They hurry you into the kitchen where you see they have prepared a huge feast for you. You quickly regret going to the buffet. However, you can feel a bit of room in your stomach, so maybe you could still eat a few things from the vast selection of meals. But once you start eating, the food is so good that you can't stop yourself from eating! Eventually you are forced to stop as your stomach is in agony.

"No wonder you got so big!" says your sister teasing you. You really need to lie down. You belch loudly and excuse yourself so you can go upstairs. You collapse on your bed and almost immediately drift into a deep sleep.

You awaken and find out it is four o'clock in the afternoon, meaning you slept for almost a full day. You groggily get up and you are heading downstairs when you catch sight of yourself in the mirror. You look huge! You look down to see the damage caused by overstuffing yourself yesterday. You can't see your feet over your belly, and you realise that your gut isn't the only thing that's grown. Your ass and thighs look massive. You are shocked. You...
131.title: Christmas Break

choices: I was always too skinny anyway.
I'll get back in shape after finals
135.content:
You and Cliff got on really well at first. Both High school jocks, pretty good with the books and anticipating getting fully into the college experience. Over the course of the first year, your paths had diverged. Cliff had become more focused on pre-med and committed to the track team. To get better focused he had moved out before Christmas and your paths hadn't crossed since. You, on the other hand, had embraced the college lifestyle fully. Pledged a frat, relaxed a bit about studying and somehow never found time for the gym. Your shrinking wardrobe never let you forget that you had put on some weight but between sweatpants and baggy shirts, you didn't think anyone noticed.
Then, one day you were somewhat desperate to keep up your C average and found yourself in the library studying. These days it was hard for you to concentrate for too long at a time so you wandered down to the basement for a soda and candy bar. And who should you run into but Cliff.
"Hey, buddy." Cliff called from the other side of the room, "Long time, no see."
"Hey Cliff." you answer. "How you doing?"
Cliff looks good, probably leaner than at the beginning of the semester- probably getting serious about cross country again. You, however find yourself trying to suck in your flabby gut. You notice Cliff's eyes scanning down your body.
He chuckles a bit. "Looks like the freshman 15 found you."
You smile back. At least he doesn't realize that you are way beyond 15. Gotta keep the grades going, Cliff. Don't have time for the gym."
"Good to see you." Cliff bounded up the stairs. "Take Care."
Soda and candy bar still in your hand you let your gut relax. "I guess I am getting fat." you think "But...
135.title: Later at the library you run into Cliff and he ...

1351.content: By the end of the school year, Nobody would consider Troy too skinny. Maybe not fat (at least that was how Troy saw it) but no longer skinny and not obviously a jock- or even ex-jock. He had upgraded his wardrobe to 34's from 32's and they were just barely containing his heftier bulk. He never had a sixpack but now there was definitely a belly and it was flabby. Still he was glad to be finished with the semester and looking forward to summer vacation and hoping to get his old job lifeguarding at the pool. The club was happy to hire him back and he was looking forward to a carefree summer and picking up chicks. There was just one problem and Troy hadn't even considered it until he got to the club and changed into his trunks. They were so tight that his belly bulged embarrassingly over the top. What to do?
1351.title: I was always too skinny anyway.

choices: After his shift, Troy decides to run
Troy checks out the weight room
13513.content:
It was now too late to do anything about the trunks so Troy just told himself that no one would notice. Sucking in his gut he walked quickly out to the lifeguard platform and climbed up. He felt conspicuous and on display but kept himself busy watching the swimmers. "Hey, college man." he heard and looked over to see Mr. Murphy, the assistant manager of the pool.
"Hey, Mr. Murphy." he called back. "Hows it going?"
"Call me Pat, college man. We are all grownups."
"OK, Pat." Troy answered aware of Pat's eyes lingering on his pudgy belly.
Pat smiled. "Freshman 15?" he asked.
"Troy was embarrassed. "Yeah," he said. "School work and staying fit just don't seem to get along. Looking forward to getting back in shape this summer."
"Good plan." Pat said. "You know we have a small weight setup in he back here which you can use if you like and shower when you are done."
"Appreciate it." Troy said. "I will keep that in mind."
"And if there is anything I can do for you, don't hesitate to ask. I'm here most of the time."
With that, Pat turned and walked toward the office. Troy looked him over.
Pat had seemed old last year but now he realized that he wasn't much over 30. Pretty well built but not cut and Troy noticed that his butt was especially well endowed.
13513.title: Just gut it out.

info.brief_description: Brady starting his first year of college away from home, can he keep up his slim figure?
info.description:
No more than a pound per day.
No magic or vore
Have fun!
